summary: An Ordinance levying a special assessments to redeem the second, third, fourth and fifth annual installments and interest to mature and become payable upon the bonds of Local Improvement District No. 424, issued under authority of Ordinance No. 7479, for the improvement of East Thomas Street et alunder Ordinance No. 6914, in accordance with the assessment roll of said district as approved by Ordinance No. 7280 providing for the collection thereof; and providing penalties for non-payment at maturity.
